column1: Little Goat Diner////I definitely left feeling like I need to give this place another shot
column2: but the first time experience was lack-luster! I went for a birthday lunch with colleagues; service at the front door felt very rushed
column3: and we were crammed at a smaller table for a large group. The restaurant is buzzing with activity
column4: and it has such a cool upscale diner feel to it
column5: but it made conversation pretty difficult.
